mapper.insert: insert into customer (id, name, nick_name, phone, email, head_img_url, password, status, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modify, modify_by, memo) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update customer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, nick_name, phone, email, head_img_url, password, status, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modify, modify_by, memo from customer where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
